descriptor.name: Cosmos Organic Sona Masoori Rice
descriptor.short_desc:
WHY COSMOS SONA MASOORI RICE

Cosmos Organic Sona Masoori rice is a type of medium-grain, lightweight, aromatic rice that is popular across India. It is called 'Swarna Massori Rice' typically grown using organic farming practices certified by Organic India, which means that no synthetic fertilizers, pesticides, or other chemicals are used during its cultivation. Perfectly aged, rich in energy, nutritious, fluffy, popularly known for its fragrant aroma and soft texture. High in Energy, Protein, and low in Fat, Sugar, and Sodium contents.

Sona Masoori rice, in general, is known for its delicate texture, subtle aroma, and flavor. It is often used in dishes such as biryani, pulao, kheer, sweet pongal, and other varieties of dishes. Organic Sona Masoori rice is considered to be a healthier option compared to conventionally grown rice as it is free from harmful chemicals.

If you are looking to buy, Cosmos Organic Sona Masuri is the ideal choice. Certified by Organic India, Jaivik Bharat, APEDA, and FSSAI-approved laboratory for Nutritional Contents to ensure that it is nutritious, truly organic, and has been grown without any synthetic chemicals.

HEALTH BENEFITS

Pesticides and fertilizer free?– Helps improve the immune system
Rich in natural proteins, vitamins
Aids digestion
Aids heart health
Helps control calories
Good for weight loss diet
Fresh and natural
COOKING DIRECTIONS 

Cooking Ratio: [same for all methods of cooking]

1 cup of Cosmos Sona Masoori white rice

2 cups of water
Instructions for cooking in a Pot: 

In a medium-sized pot, bring the water to a boil.
Add the rice to the pot and stir well. 
Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot with a tight-fitting lid, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is fully cooked and the water has been absorbed.
Remove the pot from the heat and let it sit for 5-10 minutes with the lid still on.
Fluff the rice with a spoon and serve.
NOTE: The cooking time may vary slightly depending on the age of the rice and the heat intensity of your stove. You can also adjust the amount of water depending on the desired texture of the cooked rice.

We believe that by choosing Cosmos organic sona masoori white rice, you are not only making a healthy choice for yourself but also supporting sustainable agriculture and protecting the environment.

descriptor.name: Kajumitra
descriptor.short_desc:
Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashew is the highest quality cashew nut variant offered by the brand. Here are five points that describe Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashew in more detail:

Quality: Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashew is made from the finest and largest cashew nuts that are carefully handpicked and sorted to ensure the highest quality.
Taste: The 5-star grading system ensures that every batch is consistently of the highest quality.
Health Benefits: Cashews are a great source of essential nutrients like protein, fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashews are a great way to include these nutrients in your diet.
Packaging: The cashews are packed in an airtight 200gms pack to ensure maximum freshness and flavor. The packaging also makes it easy to store and carry the cashews.
Sustainability: Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashew is committed to sustainable and ethical sourcing practices. They work closely with farmers to ensure fair prices and support local communities, and also use environmentally friendly packaging materials. Kaju Mitra 5 Star Cashew is the perfect choice for those who want the best quality cashews with exceptional taste and health benefits.

descriptor.name: Kashmiri Mamra Almonds
descriptor.short_desc:
The Prakriti Foods by Khatirdaari Kashmiri Mamra Almonds are natural, raw, unsweetened, unsalted with no additives, preservatives or added flavors, preservatives or chemicals. Relish the authentic taste of the nuts and stay healthy and happy. Almonds are one of the most nutritious foods and are loaded with vitamins, minerals, protein & fibre. They provide the perfect healthy crunch in our everyday diet. From heart health to weight management, immunity and more. 

These almonds are naturally grown and are procured by us straight from the orchards of Kashmir valley.

These are natural with zero preservatives or chemicals, no additives, gluton free, vegan , non-GMO. They are rich source of proteins like tryptophan, unsaturated fats, flavonoids, vitamins, minerals, richest source of Vitamin E, and phosphorous that helps in building strong teeth & bones.

They are cholostrol free & high in anti oxidants.

The kashmiri Mamra almonds are famous all over the world for their rich oil content of oil which is the highest in the world approximately 50%. These are rich source of proteins 

Kashmiri Kesar is preferred for its deep red color, strong flavor, and warm aroma , which provides maximum natural flavor and color to food, drinks or beauty products. Our saffron strands are free of preservatives or additives.

Our kashmiri Kesar is recommended for daily consumption of pregnant women as it helps in digestion and controls mood swinds. It strengthens the bones of babies.

Mixed with rose petals it can be used as very effective face pack and beauty product.

It can also be used for flavouring food, sweets & beverages.

descriptor.name: Organic Raw sesame
descriptor.short_desc:
Sesame seeds are tiny, oil-rich seeds that grow in pods on the Sesamum
indicum plant. They have been used in folk medicine for thousands of
years. Sesame seeds are a good source of healthy fats, protein, B
vitamins, minerals, fiber, antioxidants, and other beneficial plant
compounds. Regularly eating substantial portions of these seeds — not
just an occasional sprinkling on a burger bun — may aid blood sugar control, combat arthritis
pain, and lower cholesterol.

descriptor.name: Sprouted Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil
descriptor.short_desc:
Our premium quality Almonds/ Badam produced in India is extracted using a fusion of traditional Wood Cold Pressed Method with modern technology for extraction. We handpicked our Almonds directly from the farms of Kashmir. They are cleaned rigorously and then sun dried non-roasted nuts for the best flavor and aroma.

 

Our Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil is pure, Organic, Chemical-free, preservative free and Gluten free. We process the Almonds/ Badam in a wooden Kohlu/pestle or Kachi Ghani that presses the nuts and crushes them for extracting the oil at room temperature. All this is done at a low temperature to keep the temperature of the entire process below 40 degrees. The wood pestle absorbs any increase in temperature and does not generate heat through friction. This technique helps us keep the nutrition maintained in the oil. Once the Oil is extracted, the oil settles for 2-3 days following which, we sieve filter the Almond oil.

 

Benefits:

Sprouted Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil is pure and organic hence it will be used less in quantity for cooking as compared with refined oils. Other benefits are:

 

Contain good amount of Polyunsaturated fats which are good for your health
Nuts are pressed and crushed at the same time so the Oil is not refined or polished with chemicals
Help in lowering blood sugar levels and improves digestion
A good source of antioxidants which protect the body from disease
promotes healthy heart
Traditional method of extraction keeping all nutrients intact
Completely Natural with zero chemicals, aroma or flavor
Good source of Vitamin E and antioxidants
Good for Skincare and hair care and massage(s)
 

Our Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil can be used for dressing, sauteing, seasoning, skincare, haircare, and massage(s).

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS: Our Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil is best stored in a cool and dry place with the lid tightly closed.

PACKAGE CONTENT: 1 Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil; Quantity: 100 ML; Diet Type: Vegetarian; Shelf Life: 365 Days. Our Wood Cold Pressed Almond Oil is 100% made in India.

descriptor.name: USHA I CHEF FOOD PROCESSOR 800 W Food Processor  (Black)
descriptor.short_desc: Experience culinary excellence with the iChef Food Processor, an all-in-one kitchen marvel designed to elevate your cooking game. This versatile appliance comes equipped with 9 essential accessories, enabling a range of cooking tasks. It features 8 different functions, including chopping, kneading, shredding, French fries preparation, citrus juicing, grinding, blending, and slicing. Its 1.4-liter transparent food processing bowl not only offers ample capacity but also allows you to monitor the process, ensuring your ingredients are precisely processed to perfection.Save time, reduce kitchen clutter, and discover the joy of cooking with precision and creativity, all at your fingertips. With iChef 8-in-1 Food Processor, you can effortlessly master eight essential functions, including chopping, kneading, shredding, French fries preparation, citrus juicing, grinding, blending, and slicing.Discover the iChef Food Processor – where a 1.4 L transparent bowl brings your culinary creations to life. With a built-in safety lock, cooking becomes a worry-free delight.The iChef Food Processor simplifies meal preparation, offering versatility, convenience, and creative freedom all in one. With nine essential accessories, including a chopper blade, kneader blade, shredder blade, slicer blade, French Fries Blade, Citrus Juicer, Grinder Jar, Blender Jar, and Whisker Disk, this culinary powerhouse is designed to meet all your kitchen needs.

descriptor.name: Wonderchef Nutri Blend Food Processor - Black
descriptor.short_desc: Wonderchef once again comes up with a revolutionary food-prep solution. In times where Food Processors have become a scary word due to their unwieldy size, complexity and number of attachments. Wonderchef's most popular product, Nutri-blend creates a sensation, once again. A single, compact attachment on your Nutri-blend that chops, slices, makes juliennes and even kneads your dough with impressive speed and precision. Instead of many separate appliances, you now need only one. The 400W superfast motor blends, grinds, juices and chops in seconds. Motor unit is very steady and safe to use. Non-skid rubber footing stabilises the base. Powerful motor handles multiple prep jobs: slicing vegetables, grating cheese, mixing batters, kneading dough, pureeing soups and chopping onions, herbs or nuts.Care Instructions: Don't run the Nutri-blend for more than 1 minute at a time. Give it a 3 minute break before using again for best performance. For most applications, 20-40 seconds of operation would be enough. Do not use blending blade for dry grinding.
descriptor.long_desc: Wonderchef once again comes up with a revolutionary food-prep solution. In times where Food Processors have become a scary word due to their unwieldy size, complexity and number of attachments. Wonderchef's most popular product, Nutri-blend creates a sensation, once again. A single, compact attachment on your Nutri-blend that chops, slices, makes juliennes and even kneads your dough with impressive speed and precision. Instead of many separate appliances, you now need only one. The 400W superfast motor blends, grinds, juices and chops in seconds. Motor unit is very steady and safe to use. Non-skid rubber footing stabilises the base. Powerful motor handles multiple prep jobs: slicing vegetables, grating cheese, mixing batters, kneading dough, pureeing soups and chopping onions, herbs or nuts.Care Instructions: Don't run the Nutri-blend for more than 1 minute at a time. Give it a 3 minute break before using again for best performance. For most applications, 20-40 seconds of operation would be enough. Do not use blending blade for dry grinding.

descriptor.name: BUMTUM Baby Diaper Pants with Leakage Protection -9 to 14 Kg (Large, 56 Count, Pack of 1)
descriptor.short_desc:
LEADING BABYCARE BRAND: We know your babies require utmost care & protection while they grow. Your tot's skin is as soft as cotton and too sensitive to handle. Thus, it needs special care & attention every single moment. 

BUMTUM PANT-STYLE DIAPERS: are uniquely curated to keep your baby's day & night full of comfort and materialized with cottony soft, breathable, and non-woven material that ensures a cosy experience.

COTTONY SOFT FABRIC:- Bumtum Diaper pants, fabricated with cottony soft material are soft & gentle on baby’s skin for regular usage. The top layer designed with a diamond pattern creates a larger absorbing area & uniformly spreads the liquid for easy & fast absorption.

SOFT ELASTIC BAND:- Bumtum Diaper pants can be stretched easily due to their soft elastic band on the waistline. It facilitates an easy-wearing experience without leaving any marks.

COMPLETE DRYNESS:- The non-woven plush material keeps your baby feeling dry & assures a peaceful sleep all night.

WETNESS INDICATOR:- Wetness indicator turns from yellow to blue indicating it is time to change a diaper.

LEAKPROOF:- There is nothing to worry about leakage with the double and bubble layer cuff used in the Bumtum diaper that snugly fits your baby without any discomfort.

HIGH ABSORBENCY:- The large absorbing area of the pad ensures maximum dryness for the baby. It can hold up to 7 glasses of liquid, where 1 glass is equal to 50 ml.   

Extra Thin Core: It is designed to give Superior Absorbency and keep your Little Angel's skin Dry all day long. It is made with Ultra Soft Airfresh Material & a 360 Degree soft elastic band to keep your little one's delicate skin far from diaper rashes. The advanced double leak protection has made it the most preferred diaper pants.
descriptor.long_desc:
LEADING BABYCARE BRAND: We know your babies require utmost care & protection while they grow. Your tot's skin is as soft as cotton and too sensitive to handle. Thus, it needs special care & attention every single moment. 

BUMTUM PANT-STYLE DIAPERS: are uniquely curated to keep your baby's day & night full of comfort and materialized with cottony soft, breathable, and non-woven material that ensures a cosy experience.

COTTONY SOFT FABRIC:- Bumtum Diaper pants, fabricated with cottony soft material are soft & gentle on baby’s skin for regular usage. The top layer designed with a diamond pattern creates a larger absorbing area & uniformly spreads the liquid for easy & fast absorption.

SOFT ELASTIC BAND:- Bumtum Diaper pants can be stretched easily due to their soft elastic band on the waistline. It facilitates an easy-wearing experience without leaving any marks.

COMPLETE DRYNESS:- The non-woven plush material keeps your baby feeling dry & assures a peaceful sleep all night.

WETNESS INDICATOR:- Wetness indicator turns from yellow to blue indicating it is time to change a diaper.

LEAKPROOF:- There is nothing to worry about leakage with the double and bubble layer cuff used in the Bumtum diaper that snugly fits your baby without any discomfort.

HIGH ABSORBENCY:- The large absorbing area of the pad ensures maximum dryness for the baby. It can hold up to 7 glasses of liquid, where 1 glass is equal to 50 ml.   

Extra Thin Core: It is designed to give Superior Absorbency and keep your Little Angel's skin Dry all day long. It is made with Ultra Soft Airfresh Material & a 360 Degree soft elastic band to keep your little one's delicate skin far from diaper rashes. The advanced double leak protection has made it the most preferred diaper pants.

descriptor.name: Arsha lifestyle Manual 2 in 1 Handy smart chopper for Vegetable Fruits Nuts Onions Chopper Blender
descriptor.short_desc:
Manual 2 in 1 Handy smart chopper for Vegetable Fruits Nuts Onions Chopper Blender Mixer Food Processor

How to Use
Load: Add ingredients to VeggiChop.
Pull: Insert lid onto vessel and press closed. Pull to chop.
Chop
Make a Guacamole or salsa, blend a humus or make fresh, healthy babyfood.

Powerful & Versatile

Unlike other choppers that are prone to breakage and failures, the Manual 2 in 1 Handy smart chopper were stress tested intensively and proven to last over hundreds of thousands of uses without issues. It's perfect for slicing, mixing vegetable/fruit salads, cutting various foods for baby, chopping nuts, herbs, veggies, pesto, hummus, salsa, guacamole, ice, and more. It is a multi purpose vegetable chopper, salad chopper, onion chopper, garlic chopper, herb chopper.

Easy Cleaning

Blades and bowl are top-rack dishwasher safe. Components come apart for easy cleaning.

Multipurpose Hand Chopper: Versatile Kitchen Gadget is Great for Dicing, Mincing & Crushing Garlic, Onion, Tomato, Fruit, Nuts, Herbs, Vegetables & More
Effortless Operation: Small But Powerful Device Includes Bowl, Removable Sharp Stainless Steel Blade & Cover with Handle; Insert Food, Secure Top & Pull Easy Grip Handle for Fast Results, Blades and bowl are top-rack dishwasher safe
This hand food chopper takes the hard work out of chopping & blending vegetables, fruits, nuts and herbs. Features sharp stainless steel blades for fast and even chopping/mincing, comfort soft grip lid, anti-skid base, easy pull cord, and a large handle
Great for small kitchens, RVs, travel and camping. Made from BPA free, food safe plastic. Blades are all concealed during use for the utmost safety
More Convenient, Quieter & Less Messy: Electric food choppers are powerful however they can be prone to failure, take a long time to clean and get so noisy they can wake the whole family up. It's time to get your chopping jobs done the smart & simple way with this manual chopper!

descriptor.name: Hawkins Contura Hard Anodised Black Inner Lid Pressure Cooker - With Handle, CB50, 5
descriptor.short_desc:
The hard anodised models have all the features and benefits of the Hawkins Contura Pressure Cooker in a hard anodised body and stainless-steel lid. The beautiful, durable black finish given by 60 microns thick hard anodising has two benefits. It makes the pressure cooker absorb heat faster, making it more energy efficient. And the pressure cooker stays looking new for years. Recommended for use on gas stoves. What is Hard Anodising? Russian scientists first developed hard anodising to produce a metal surface tough enough for space travel. Hawkins now uses the same technology to make its Hard Anodised pressure cookers and cookware. Through a process of electrolysis at sub-zero temperature using a high-intensity electric current, a 60-micron thick layer of aluminium oxide (Al2O3) is formed molecule by molecule as an integral part of the metal. This process produces a surface harder than steel with wonderful properties for cooking. The Hard Anodised surface is non-toxic, non-staining and non-reactive with foods. It is thermal-efficient, heats fast and evenly and is not spoiled by high heat. It is tough and durable, will not tarnish or corrode and will stay looking new for years. Ideal for 5 or 7 persons. 

Features & Benefits: 

New improved pressure regulator
Operates at 1 kg/cm2 (15 pounds / square inch) pressure.
Pressure-locked Safety lid – cannot be opened while there is pressure inside.
Safety valve under lid handlebar for greater safety
Hard anodised body - thermal efficient; heats fast and evenly
Cooks faster - save more fuel.
Will not pit, tarnish, or corrode – stays looking new for years.
Non-toxic, non-staining – does not react with foods.
descriptor.long_desc:
The hard anodised models have all the features and benefits of the Hawkins Contura Pressure Cooker in a hard anodised body and stainless-steel lid. The beautiful, durable black finish given by 60 microns thick hard anodising has two benefits. It makes the pressure cooker absorb heat faster, making it more energy efficient. And the pressure cooker stays looking new for years. Recommended for use on gas stoves. What is Hard Anodising? Russian scientists first developed hard anodising to produce a metal surface tough enough for space travel. Hawkins now uses the same technology to make its Hard Anodised pressure cookers and cookware. Through a process of electrolysis at sub-zero temperature using a high-intensity electric current, a 60-micron thick layer of aluminium oxide (Al2O3) is formed molecule by molecule as an integral part of the metal. This process produces a surface harder than steel with wonderful properties for cooking. The Hard Anodised surface is non-toxic, non-staining and non-reactive with foods. It is thermal-efficient, heats fast and evenly and is not spoiled by high heat. It is tough and durable, will not tarnish or corrode and will stay looking new for years. Ideal for 5 or 7 persons. 

Features & Benefits:

Operates at 1 kg/cm2 (15 pounds / square inch) pressure.

Hard anodised body - thermal efficient; heats fast and evenly
Cooks faster - save more fuel.

Non-toxic, non-staining – does not react with foods.
